data.title: Listening to Indians Research Guide
data.meta_description: A guide to the oral history collection of interviews with American Indian people conducted by Samuel I. Myers, Jr., history professor at St. Louis Community College - Florissant Valley during his sabbatical semester, Fall 1975. Transcripts of the 144 core interviews of the collection
data.text: We believe all these materials were provided with the full consent of the participants to publicize their interviews. If we have published culturally sensitive materials, please let us know so that we may treat them with appropriate care.
